    mergeron.gen.upp_tests¶

    Methods to compute intrinsic clearance rates and intrinsic enforcement rates from generated market data.

    Module Contents¶

    mergeron.gen.upp_tests.SaveData : TypeAlias = Literal[False] | tuple[Literal[True], ptb.File, ptb.Group][source]¶

    mergeron.gen.upp_tests.enf_cnts(_market_data_sample, _upp_test_parms, _upp_test_regime, /)[source]¶

    Estimate enforcement and clearance counts from market data sample

    Parameters:¶
    _market_data_sample : mergeron.gen.MarketDataSample¶

    Market data sample

    _upp_test_parms : mergeron.core.guidelines_boundaries.HMGThresholds¶

    Threshold values for various Guidelines criteria

    _upp_test_regime : mergeron.gen.UPPTestRegime¶

    Specifies whether to analyze enforcement, clearance, or both and the GUPPI and diversion ratio aggregators employed, with default being to analyze enforcement based on the maximum merging-firm GUPPI and maximum diversion ratio between the merging firms

    Returns:¶

    Enforced and cleared counts

    Return type:¶

    UPPTestsCounts

    mergeron.gen.upp_tests.gen_upp_test_arrays(_market_data, _upp_test_parms, _sim_test_regime, /)[source]¶

    Generate UPP tests arrays for given configuration and market sample

    Given a standards vector, market

    Parameters:¶
    _market_data : mergeron.gen.MarketDataSample¶

    market data sample

    _upp_test_parms : mergeron.core.guidelines_boundaries.HMGThresholds¶

    guidelines thresholds for testing UPP and related statistics

    _sim_test_regime : mergeron.gen.UPPTestRegime¶

    configuration to use for generating UPP tests
